short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A better way of verifying twitter users. Makes all users EXCEPT twitter blue subscribers verified.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension fills a critical gap in the Twitter verification system: nobody likes it.
To remedy this, we've developed a new system for vurification. To be clear, this is not verification.
Vurified will immediately remove any verified status for Twitter blue users (and give them a "PHONY" tag). Additionally, we'll vurify all the good Twitter users who don't pay $8/mo or are actually verified. This should clear up any perception that the verified check ever meant anything, as well as let you know which one of your friends wasted $8.
We cannot emphasize enough, we are not affiliated with Twitter or Elon Musk, in the same way we're not affiliated with a garbage fire and an eight hundred pound walrus.

If you like this extension, please consider leaving a review! If you don't like this extension, we pity you.
